thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 24 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF- Canadian Solar Infrastructure Fund to acquire properties for 992 mln yen and to take out loan of 900 mln yen

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF- Canadian Solar Infrastructure Fund to acquire properties for 992 mln yen and to take out loan of 900 mln yen

organizations.name: reuters) - canadian solar infrastructure fund inc

text:
Jan 24(Reuters) - Canadian Solar Infrastructure Fund Inc
* Says it will acquire two properties for 992 million yen in total, on Feb. 1
* Says it will take out a loan of 900 million yen to fund the acquisition, from Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corporation, on Feb. 1
Source text in Japanese: goo.gl/Y5Y1QW ; goo.gl/ZEf69j
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
